typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	param_FileSystem as string ("container-adf-nido-prod-eastau-100-1"),
	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_Employees")
}
source(output(
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		dateOfBirth as date,
		emailAddress as string,
		employeeId as string,
		employeeNumber as integer,
		firstName as string,
		gender as string,
		hiredDate as date,
		lastModified as string,
		middleName as string,
		organization as (name as string, organizationId as string),
		organizationId as string,
		paymentAccounts as (bankAccount as (accountName as string, accountNumber as integer, bsb as string, reference as string), employeePaymentAccountId as string, paySplit as (amount as double, type as string), sortOrder as boolean)[],
		phoneNumbers as (type as string, value as string)[],
		preferredName as string,
		streetAddresses as (components as string, coordinate as string, countryCode as string, fullAddress as string, postCode as short, state as string, street as string, suburb as string, type as string)[],
		superAccounts as (ceaseDate as string, commencementDate as string, employeeId as string, employeeSuperannuationAccountId as string, fundABN as long, fundESA as string, fundName as string, fundType as string, fundUSI as string, membershipNumber as string, smsfBankAccount as (accountName as string, accountNumber as integer, bsb as integer, reference as string))[],
		superContributions as (amount as double, ceaseDate as string, commencementDate as string, employeeId as string, employeeSuperannuationAccountId as string, employeeSuperannuationContributionId as string, minimumAmount as string, payItemDescription as string, payItemId as string, valueType as string)[],
		surname as string,
		taxDeclaration as (australianResidentForTaxPurposes as boolean, canEdit as boolean, claimDependantsOrSpecialTaxOffset as boolean, claimMedicareLevyVariation as boolean, claimSeniorsPensionersOffset as boolean, claimTaxFreeThreshold as boolean, effectiveDate as string, employeeId as string, employeeTaxDeclarationId as string, financialSupplementDebt as boolean, helpDebt as boolean, lodgementDate as string, lodgementStatus as string, signatureDate as string, signaturePresent as string, taxFileNumber as integer, taxFileNumberExemption as string, workingHolidayMaker as boolean),
		title as string,
		username as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
selectEmployee derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%')||like(name,'%lastModified%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns1
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		paymentAccounts,
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectPaymentAccounts
selectPaymentAccounts foldDown(unroll(paymentAccounts),
	mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		employeePaymentAccountId = paymentAccounts.employeePaymentAccountId,
		sortOrder = paymentAccounts.sortOrder,
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName,
		every(paymentAccounts.bankAccount,match(true()),
			$0 = $$),
		every(paymentAccounts.paySplit,match(true()),
			$0 = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenPaymentAccounts
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		dateOfBirth,
		emailAddress,
		employeeNumber,
		firstName,
		gender,
		hiredDate,
		lastModified,
		middleName,
		preferredName,
		surname,
		title,
		username,
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectEmployee
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		phoneNumbers,
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectPhoneNumbers
selectPhoneNumbers foldDown(unroll(phoneNumbers),
	mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		type = phoneNumbers.type,
		value = phoneNumbers.value,
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenPhoneNumbers
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		streetAddresses,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectStreetAddresses
selectStreetAddresses foldDown(unroll(streetAddresses),
	mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		components = streetAddresses.components,
		coordinate = streetAddresses.coordinate,
		countryCode = streetAddresses.countryCode,
		fullAddress = streetAddresses.fullAddress,
		postCode = streetAddresses.postCode,
		state = streetAddresses.state,
		street = streetAddresses.street,
		suburb = streetAddresses.suburb,
		type = streetAddresses.type,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenStreetAddresses
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		superAccounts,
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectSuperAccounts
selectSuperAccounts foldDown(unroll(superAccounts),
	mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		ceaseDate = superAccounts.ceaseDate,
		commencementDate = superAccounts.commencementDate,
		{superAccounts.employeeId} = superAccounts.employeeId,
		employeeSuperannuationAccountId = superAccounts.employeeSuperannuationAccountId,
		fundABN = superAccounts.fundABN,
		fundESA = superAccounts.fundESA,
		fundName = superAccounts.fundName,
		fundType = superAccounts.fundType,
		fundUSI = superAccounts.fundUSI,
		membershipNumber = superAccounts.membershipNumber,
		{smsfBankAccount.accountName} = superAccounts.smsfBankAccount.accountName,
		{smsfBankAccount.accountNumber} = superAccounts.smsfBankAccount.accountNumber,
		{smsfBankAccount.bsb} = superAccounts.smsfBankAccount.bsb,
		{smsfBankAccount.reference} = superAccounts.smsfBankAccount.reference,
		pipelineRunId = PipelineRunId,
		pipelineTriggerTime = PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenSuperAccounts
sourceJson select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		superContributions,
		PipelineName,
		pipelineRunId = PipelineRunId,
		pipelineTriggerTime = PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectSuperContributions
selectSuperContributions foldDown(unroll(superContributions),
	mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		amount = superContributions.amount,
		ceaseDate = superContributions.ceaseDate,
		commencementDate = superContributions.commencementDate,
		{superContributions.employeeId} = superContributions.employeeId,
		employeeSuperannuationAccountId = superContributions.employeeSuperannuationAccountId,
		employeeSuperannuationContributionId = superContributions.employeeSuperannuationContributionId,
		minimumAmount = superContributions.minimumAmount,
		payItemDescription = superContributions.payItemDescription,
		payItemId = superContributions.payItemId,
		valueType = superContributions.valueType,
		pipelineRunId,
		pipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenSuperContributions
sourceJson select(mapColumn(

		organizationId,
		taxDeclaration,
		PipelineName,
		pipelineRunId = PipelineRunId,
		pipelineTriggerTime = PipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectTaxDeclarationObject
selectTaxDeclarationObject select(mapColumn(
		employeeId,
		organizationId,
		taxDeclaration = taxDeclaration.australianResidentForTaxPurposes,
		canEdit = taxDeclaration.canEdit,
		claimDependantsOrSpecialTaxOffset = taxDeclaration.claimDependantsOrSpecialTaxOffset,
		claimMedicareLevyVariation = taxDeclaration.claimMedicareLevyVariation,
		claimSeniorsPensionersOffset = taxDeclaration.claimSeniorsPensionersOffset,
		claimTaxFreeThreshold = taxDeclaration.claimTaxFreeThreshold,
		effectiveDate = taxDeclaration.effectiveDate,
		{taxDeclaration.employeeId} = taxDeclaration.employeeId,
		employeeTaxDeclarationId = taxDeclaration.employeeTaxDeclarationId,
		financialSupplementDebt = taxDeclaration.financialSupplementDebt,
		helpDebt = taxDeclaration.helpDebt,
		lodgementDate = taxDeclaration.lodgementDate,
		lodgementStatus = taxDeclaration.lodgementStatus,
		signatureDate = taxDeclaration.signatureDate,
		signaturePresent = taxDeclaration.signaturePresent,
		taxFileNumber = taxDeclaration.taxFileNumber,
		taxFileNumberExemption = taxDeclaration.taxFileNumberExemption,
		workingHolidayMaker = taxDeclaration.workingHolidayMaker,
		PipelineName,
		pipelineRunId,
		pipelineTriggerTime,
		SourceFileName
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectTaxDeclarationItems
selectTaxDeclarationItems derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns7
flattenSuperContributions derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns6

typeProperties.script:
parameters{

	param_ErrorRowDirectory as string ("ErrorRows"),
	param_DataflowName as string ("df_OrgPayRuns")
}
source(output(
		{Org.LegalName} as string,
		{Org.OrganizationId} as string,
		PipelineName as string,
		PipelineRunId as string,
		PipelineTriggerId as string,
		PipelineTriggerTime as string,
		currentFinancialYearEndDate as string,
		currentFinancialYearStartDate as string,
		payCalendars as (atoLodgementsEnabled as boolean, description as string, payCalendarId as string, period as string, periodStartDate as string, proRataMode as string, weeklyFactor as double, weeklyFactorEquation as short)[],
		payRuns as (backPayDateOverride as string, dateLastCalculated as string, dateOpened as string, datePublished as string, employeeCount as short, eofyLodgementStatus as string, financialYearEndDate as string, financialYearStartDate as string, initiatingUserId as string, initiatingUserName as string, lodgementStatus as string, notes as string, payCalendarId as string, payCalendarName as string, payRunId as string, paymentDate as string, payslipGenerationStatus as string, periodEnd as string, periodStart as string, publishingUserId as string, publishingUserName as string, runNumber as short, status as string, superannuationPaymentDate as string, type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'SourceFileName',
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson foldDown(unroll(payRuns),
	mapColumn(
		backPayDateOverride = payRuns.backPayDateOverride,
		dateLastCalculated = payRuns.dateLastCalculated,
		dateOpened = payRuns.dateOpened,
		datePublished = payRuns.datePublished,
		employeeCount = payRuns.employeeCount,
		eofyLodgementStatus = payRuns.eofyLodgementStatus,
		financialYearEndDate = payRuns.financialYearEndDate,
		financialYearStartDate = payRuns.financialYearStartDate,
		initiatingUserId = payRuns.initiatingUserId,
		initiatingUserName = payRuns.initiatingUserName,
		lodgementStatus = payRuns.lodgementStatus,
		notes = payRuns.notes,
		payCalendarId = payRuns.payCalendarId,
		payCalendarName = payRuns.payCalendarName,
		payRunId = payRuns.payRunId,
		paymentDate = payRuns.paymentDate,
		payslipGenerationStatus = payRuns.payslipGenerationStatus,
		periodEnd = payRuns.periodEnd,
		periodStart = payRuns.periodStart,
		publishingUserId = payRuns.publishingUserId,
		publishingUserName = payRuns.publishingUserName,
		runNumber = payRuns.runNumber,
		status = payRuns.status,
		superannuationPaymentDate = payRuns.superannuationPaymentDate,
		type = payRuns.type,
		{Org.LegalName},
		{Org.OrganizationId},
		PipelineName,
		PipelineRunId,
		PipelineTriggerTime,
		currentFinancialYearEndDate,
		currentFinancialYearStartDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> flattenPayRuns
flattenPayRuns derive(each(match(not(typeMatch(type,'datetime'))&&(like(name,'%date%')||like(name,'%Date%')||like(name,'%Time%')||like(name,'%time%'))), $$ = toTimestamp(toString($$), 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'A.U.S. Eastern Standard Time'))) ~> castDateColumns
castDateColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'allErrors',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_fileSystem: ($param_FileSystem),
	rejectedData_folderPath: ($param_ErrorRowDirectory),
	transactionCommit: 'batch',
	reportSuccessOnError: true) ~> sinkSql

		modifiedDate as string,

	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> sourceJson
sourceJson derive(end = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', end, ':00')),
		start = toTimestamp(concat(toString(toDate(date)), ' ', start, ':00')),
		date = toDate(date),
		PipelineTriggerTime = toTimestamp(PipelineTriggerTime, 'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss', 'Australia/NSW'),
